original_text: With him will I speak mouth to mouth, even apparently, and not in dark speeches; and the similitude of the Lord shall he behold: wherefore then were ye not afraid to speak against my servant Moses?
korean_text: 그와는 내가 대면하여 명백히 말하고 은밀한 말로 하지 아니하며 그는 또 여호와의 형상을 보거늘 너희가 어찌하여 내 종 모세 비방하기를 두려워하지 아니하느냐

sentences.original_text: With him will I speak mouth to mouth
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 입과 입으로 맞대어 내가 말하리라

sentences.original_text: and the similitude of the Lord shall he behold
wherefore then were ye not afraid
to speak against my servant Moses?
